title: How to Decompile HP LaserJet Pro M12w firmware in Ghidra
content:
I'm trying to decompile HP LaserJet Pro M12w firmware with Ghidra,
after download the HP LaserJet Firmware Update Utility from this link, when I look at this file, I found two file, hpm12a.pkg and hpm12w.pkg (w means wifi).
When I analysis hpm12w.pkg with binwalk, got following information:

ELF, 32-bit MSB executable, version 1 (SYSV)
Copyright string: "Copyright (c) 1996-2001 Express Logic Inc. * ThreadX ARM9/ARM Version G4.0.4.0 *"
Copyright string: "Copyright (c) 2008   Marvell Semiconductor, Inc. All Rights Reserved."
...

This is my question: after add hpm12w.pkg to Ghidra, I could not find right "Language" for this binary file
